title: MOOC-Based Personalized Mathematics Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of college-level foundational mathematics (calculus, linear algebra)
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in designing learner-customized mathematics MOOC content in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Learners can design a blended feedback system (automated graded quizzes + peer assessment) suitable for MOOC platforms.
Learners can develop flexible math learning activities (alternative assignments, mobile learning materials).
Learners can establish personalized content recommendation strategies through learner data analysis.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
